sequence.msg: I don’t really know her that well, sorry. She keeps to herself mostly.
All I know is I’m making just enough to keep my head above water. The job is really easy so I guess I shouldn’t really complain.

You know, I have always thought there was something strange about this job. Just pressing a button all day? Cooling down a nuclear reactor by pressing a button? Now I’m not a nuclear scientist or anything but I’m pretty sure that’s not how this actually works.
